name: LPE InstallerFileTakeOver PoC CVE-2021-41379
description: Detects PoC tool used to exploit LPE vulnerability CVE-2021-41379
false_positives: Other MSI packages for which your admins have used that name
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(winlog.channel:Application AND event.code:1033 AND winlog.provider_name:MsiInstaller AND Data:*test\ pkg*)`
